body: "We too busy having dramatic, Days-of-our-lives type enquiries to stop for a minute and realise that this year, more than any other year to date, is all about us. It's about the African people. It's about youth": Ruthibelle is dismayed that the UN International Year of Youth is not being celebrated in Jamaica.
original_body: "We too busy having dramatic, Days-of-our-lives type enquiries to stop for a minute and realise that this year, more than any other year to date, is all about us. It's about the African people. It's about youth": Ruthibelle is dismayed that the UN International Year of Youth is not being celebrated in Jamaica.
title: Jamaica: Nothing for the Youth?
